text: Chelona is a locality in the Mackay Region, Queensland, Australia. == History == Chelona State School opened on 23 January 1893. A postal receiving office opened at Chelona in August 1902. It became a post office on 1 July 1927 and closed on 2 March 1964. == Amenities == The Mackay Regional Council operates a mobile library service on a fortnightly schedule at Dunrock Road near the school. ==References== Category:Mackay Region Category:Localities in Queensland
title: Chelona, Queensland
